awd_titl_txt: Travel Support for International Conference on Wind         Engineering 1991
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator will attend the                                      8th International Conference on Wind                                            Engineering which will take place on 8-12                                       July, 1991, in London, Ontario, Canada.  He                                     will present two papers entitled:  the first,                                   "Computation of Pressures on Texas Tech                                         Building", and the second, "Numerical                                           Simulation of Thunderstorm Downdrafts".                                         These conferences are held every four years                                     and are the most important gatherings for                                       this area of specialization thus, providing                                     the participants with the opportunity of                                        exchanging information about the state-of-                                      the-art in wind engineering.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
